de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic

Class AbstractLotSizingPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.AbstractLotSizingPeriod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalDistributedLotSizingPeriod

    public abstract class AbstractLotSizingPeriod
extends Object
    Author:
    Andi Popp A class representing a single period in a stochastic lot sizing problem.

      • getOrderDistributions

        public abstract RealDistribution[] getOrderDistributions()
        The field returned by this method represents the adavance order information coming in. If t is the time index of the Period object, the RealDistribution object at array position i represents the orders coming in at periode t-i.
        Returns:
        the distributions of the orders

      • getAggregatedDemandDistribution

        public abstract RealDistribution getAggregatedDemandDistribution()
        This functions convolutes the AbstractLotSizingPeriod#orderDistributions into a single aggregated distribution.
        Returns:
        the distribution of the aggregated demand
